subject: Kidnapping
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Pirates prospect José Tabata said his wife lied to him about being pregnant with his child before she was accused of abducting a 2-month-old girl, who has since been returned to her parents.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Pirates prospect José Tabata said his wife lied to him about being pregnant with his child before she was accused of abducting a 2-month-old girl, who has since been returned to her parents.
